description:
Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.

This description is relevant for UK residents only.

Make your spend, well-spent

- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way

Send money near, far, wherever they are

- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension

Save the interest-ing way

- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying

Explore investments (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)

- Start investing from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Investment services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 11567840) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN: 933846). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.
End the overspend

- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).

Unlock security features that you control

- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money

How we protect your money

- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900562). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

Join over 17 million users worldwide who trust tricount to split bills, track expenses, and settle up—free and unlimited.

tricount is the easiest way to split costs, manage group expenses, and settle balances with friends, roomies, or your partner. Whether you're organizing a trip, splitting rent, or going out to dinner, tricount helps you stay on top of every bill—fairly and stress-free.

Why Choose tricount?
• Free & unlimited – No subscription, no hidden fees, no limit on tricounts or expenses
• Fair splits – Even for uneven amounts
• Great for roomies, couples, friends, or any shared situation
• Ideal for cost split on rent, trips, groceries, shared budgets, and more
• Real-time bill tracking with clear payback and balance overviews
• Send and receive payment requests instantly through the app
• Built-in calculator for easy amounts per person
• Share expense photos and track everything—even offline
• Supports multiple currencies for international trips
• Better than spreadsheets—and easier than Splitwise

Whether you're planning a getaway, splitting a check, or managing household costs, tricount is the smart, simple way to share expenses and stay organized.

Download tricount today – the best way to split, track, and settle group expenses. 100% free, unlimited, and trusted by millions.

S-Net Mobile, the Banque et Caisse d’Epargne de l’Etat, Luxembourg (Spuerkeess)’s free mobile banking app allows you to: 

• view the transactions on your accounts and credit cards,
• execute payments (Eurotransferts),
• send secure messages to the Spuerkeess and access your received mail and documents,
• find a Spuerkeess branch or S-BANK ATM,
• simulate your personal or mortgage loan.

Furthermore, the PIN-login allows an even faster access to your daily banking operations.

PAYCONIQ MOBILE PAYMENT: FAST, CONVENIENT, SECURE & FREE 
 
Payconiq is a free App that enables you:
- to pay in stores, your bills, in other Apps, in online shops across the Benelux,
- to send, receive and request money to and from any phone number, with transfers via the underlying bank account(s). 
 
- Quick & convenient
- Free (except mobile operator charges)
- Transfers and payments from € 0.01 up to € 2,500 
- Highly secure & set your own payment limits
- Send and request money to/from any mobile number - with underlying bank transfer
- Works for most Luxembourg bank accounts/customers
- Available in hundreds of stores and with many (utility) bill issuers 

* A BANK PAYMENT APP
 
The BGL BNP Paribas Payconiq App is linked both to your phone number and your bank account(s). It meets banking-grade security standards; all payments are authorised with your biometrics or your PIN Code. You can set your security limits according to your preferences (default: EUR 2,500). Payments are made using (SEPA) bank transfer (funds may only be available the next working day). 
 
* QUICK ACTIVATION
 
To start using the App right away, all you have to do is to link it to your bank account. Launch the App and you’ll be guided through the process, it’s fairly easy. 
 
* SEND, RECEIVE & REQUEST MONEY
 
Payconiq is by far the fastest way to transfer money between two people. Choose the recipient’s phone number from your address book, type in the amount, authorise the payment and a SMS/push message is sent to the recipient. If the recipient has already activated Payconiq, the operation is triggered immediately, and if not, a SMS message is send out inviting the recipient to subscribe. Once he/she has activated Payconiq, funds will be transferred into the recipient’s bank account. 
 
Request money from any phone number: the most convenient way to get paid back by your friends, family or colleagues. Simply choose their phone number, type in the amount and they’ll get the request. You’ll receive a notification once they have made the requested payment. 
 
* IN STORE PAYMENT WITH PAYCONIQ QR CODES
 
Truly contactless payments with Payconiq QR codes: launch the Payconiq App, scan the Payconiq QR code and the amount to pay is automatically displayed on your phone. Validate the payment with your biometrics/PIN Code and you’re done.

* BILL PAYMENT WITH QR CODES
 
The quickest way to pay the bills: launch the App, scan the Payconiq QR Code on the bill, confirm the payment and you’re done, typically in less than 10 seconds. It works with your insurance and energy bills, with your telecom and public sector/municipality invoices provided Payconiq payments are accepted. 
 
Feel free to use it at Payconiq partner restaurants as well: no need to wait for the payment terminal, just scan the QR Code on the bill. You may even add a tip and then just leave right away. 
 
* PAYMENT IN OTHER APPS & IN ONLINE STORES
 
Top up your kid’s Restopolis account or use Payconiq on selected web sites: it is the most secure and the most convenient way to pay by clicking on the Payconiq button in the App/web site or in the web store. No card or bank data is transferred and nobody else can use your Payconiq App as all payments are authorised via fingerprint/PIN Code.

The BGL BNP Paribas Web Banking app: smooth, simple and secure!

►MANAGE YOUR MONEY WITH COMPLETE FREEDOM
Keep track of all your banking transactions, wherever you are.

►QUICKS INSIGHTS
No need to log in to acces your key information thanks to the Express View.

►TRANSFER WITH EASE
Make instant and international transfers in a matter of seconds.

►MANAGE YOUR CARDS
Activate a card, change a limit and view your PIN securely.

►SUBSCRIBE IN A FEW STEPS
Explore and subscribe to banking products directly from your phone.

►CHAT WITH GENIUS
Your chatbot is available 24/7, so you can get help right away.

►CONTROL YOUR BUDGET
Receive personalized alerts and advice from Genius to better manage your money.

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

BILnet: simple, fast, and easy to use. You can perform all of your essential transactions on your mobile!

Manage, group, and rename your accounts independently

-	View your account and credit card balances and transactions in real time
-	Log in as the account holder or an agent
-	When you log in to BILnet as an agent, your accounts are now grouped. Tip: to make organising your accounts easier, feel free to rename your accounts and/or change the order in which they are displayed.

Free instant payments, made in a few seconds and in just a few clicks! 

-	Your eligible SEPA (single euro payment area) payments are now made instantly, within a few seconds, 24/7, and for free! *
-	If your instant payment cannot be made, for example if the receiving bank does not accept instant payments, then your payment will be treated as a standard transfer under the relevant time frame.

The interface for your transfers and standing orders has been tweaked

-	Extra fields are now provided when entering details about the beneficiaries of your transfers. From your computer you can set up a standing order directly from the transfer entry screen. Just tick the “Make this a standing order” box. Tip: to avoid making a mistake when you enter your new beneficiary’s IBAN, you can copy/paste it straight into the appropriate field.

Better loan management 

-	Your mortgages and your personal, student and investment loans appear in the dedicated “Loan” section of BILnet. These loans now take the form of a contract rather than an account on which movements are recorded. 
-	You can now find additional information about your loans in BILnet, including:

o	type of loan
o	amount borrowed/used
o	current interest rate
o	next due dates
o	capital outstanding

Find all your electronic documents easily

-	Download your banking documents in PDF format
-	Take advantage of the free and environmentally friendly paper-free option so that you no longer receive your documents by post
-	Sign your documents electronically
-	All electronic documents are now sorted by date

Contact us whenever you need to

-	Communicate with the bank using secure messaging and share any attachments required 

Don’t have an account yet? Visit bil.com for more information. 

The app is available in four languages (FR, DE, EN, PT).

*For more information about our tariffs, visit bil.com

The smartest way to invest, spend and bank.
Earn 2 % interest on unlimited cash with your current account. Get your subscription free card to spend and earn 1 % Saveback. Invest easily and safely with just 1 €.

Earn while you spend
- Activate 2 % annual interest and earn money every month on unlimited cash balances.
- No monthly subscription fee. Unlimited free ATM withdrawals worldwide above 100 €.
- Earn 1 % Saveback on card spending into your savings plan. You can earn Saveback on up to 1,500 € in monthly spending. To qualify, invest at least 50 € monthly in savings plans.
- Round up card payments and invest spare change on the go.

Save now for later
- Invest with just 1 € in stocks, ETFs or crypto. No hidden fees, easy and safe.
- Savings Plans on ETFs or stocks to invest continuously for long term wealth.
- Bonds to lock in high interest for years and get regular payments. Start with 1 €, sell anytime.
- Invest in Private Markets. 12 % market target return and more diversification.
- Invest in Fixed Income. Earn 1-3 % more interest than on your regular savings accounts. 


Trusted by millions
- Over 10 millions users and 150 billions € of assets across 18 European countries.
- German bank regulated by BaFin and Bundesbank.
- Publicly regulated exchange and better spreads than the reference market.

We are on a mission to empower everyone to create wealth with easy, safe and free access to the financial system.

Disclaimer: Not all of the before mentioned services are available in all the markets. The scope and availability of our Stock, ETF, Savings Plan, Crypto, Bonds and Derivative offering may vary according to the country. Please refer to our website for more information.

Brunnenstr. 19-21 
10119 Berlin, Germany

Revolut is the money app designed to spend, save, and set money aside.

What's in store:
• Get your own customisable debit card and virtual cards to add to your Apple or Google Wallet (personalisation fees may apply)
• Send money between friends on Revolut (minimum age restriction applies)
• Receive money from everyone — even if they’re not on Revolut — with Payment Links
• Save and earn with a Savings account
• Get a 360º view of your money with Analytics
• If you’re in the UK, you can move to the main app once you turn 16

 
How does it work?
1. Download this app and create an account (if you're below the age of data consent, your parent will need to create an account for you from their Revolut app. You can check the age of data consent in your country below)
2. Get approved by your parent or guardian
3. Choose a debit card and customise it with text, stickers, and your own sketches (personalisation fees may apply), then order it from your parent's app
4. Add your card to Apple or Google Wallet to start spending straight away (minimum age restriction applies)
 
Parents and guardians, this part's for you ↓
With Revolut, they can manage their money independently, under your supervision.
Teens above the age of data consent can sign up themselves, but you'll have access to security controls, like spending notifications, in-app card freezes, and many other features to give you peace of mind.
If you have teens below the age of data consent, you can create an account for them from your Revolut app. Here’s how: 
1. Have them download this app and create an account
2. Approve their account from your Revolut app
3. Order their prepaid debit card from your app (personalisation fees may apply)

Find your country's age of data consent ↓

In Bulgaria, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Gibraltar, Iceland, Latvia, Malta, Norway, Portugal, Singapore, Sweden, Switzerland, the United Kingdom, or the United States:
• Teens aged 13+ can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Teens aged 12 or under (minimum age restrictions apply) will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 13+

In Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Italy, Lithuania, or Spain:
• Teens aged 14+ can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Those aged 13 or under will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 14+

In Australia, Czech Republic, Greece, or Slovenia:
• Teens aged 15+ can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Those aged 14 or under will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 15+ (referrals subject to feature availability in your country)

In Croatia, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, Poland, Romania, or Slovakia:
• Teens aged 16 and above can create an account with parent or guardian approval
• Those ages 15 or under will need a parent or guardian to create their account from the main Revolut app
• Referrals and payments to and from customers on this app are only available to teens aged 16+

taxx.lu Scanner is a tool for users of the taxx.lu platform. The aim of taxx.lu is to make it possible to fill in tax returns online in a simple and quick way.

The advantages of taxx.lu Scanner :
The taxx.lu Scanner application allows you to use your smartphone as scanner to easily scan all necessary documents for your tax return. Thanks to the Auto Scan function, the data is automatically recognized and imported into your tax return. Thus, manual data entry can be avoided.

How does it work?
taxx.lu Scanner automatically recognises your certificate, reframes it, centralises it and improves the perspective! This enables the Auto Scan function to recognize the necessary data of your certificate."

PAYCONIQ MOBILE PAYMENT: FAST, CONVENIENT, SECURE & FREE
 
PAYCONIQ is a free App that enables you to pay in stores or online, to pay your bills and to send, receive & request money to and from any phone number, with transfers via the underlying bank account(s) in Luxembourg.
 
- Quick & convenient
- Free (except mobile operator charges)
- From 0.01 € up to 10,000 €
- Highly secure & set your own payment limits
- Send & request money to/from any mobile number - with underlying bank transfer
- Works for most Luxembourg bank accounts/customers
- Available in hundreds of stores and with many (utility) bill issuers
 
*** A BANK PAYMENT APP
 
The PAYCONIQ App is linked both to your phone number and your bank account(s). It meets banking-grade security standards; all payments are authorised with your Fingerprint or your PIN Code. You can set your security limits according to your preferences (default: 2500 EUR). Payments are made using (SEPA) bank transfer (funds may only be available the next working day).
 
*** QUICK ACTIVATION
 
To start using the App right away, all you have to do is to link it to your bank account. Launch the App and you’ll be guided through the process, it’s fairly easy.
 
*** SEND, RECEIVE & REQUEST MONEY
 
PAYCONIQ is by far the fastest way to transfer money between two people. Choose the recipient’s phone number from your address book, type in the amount, authorise the payment and a SMS/push message is sent to the recipient. If the recipient has already activated PAYCONIQ, the operation is triggered immediately, and if not, a SMS message is sent out inviting the recipient to subscribe. Once he/she has activated PAYCONIQ, funds will be transferred into the recipient’s bank account.
 
Request money from any phone number: the most convenient way to get paid back by your friends, family or colleagues. Simply choose their phone number, type in the amount and they’ll get the request. You’ll receive a notification once they have made the requested payment.
 
*** IN STORE PAYMENT 
 
Truly contactless payments: launch the PAYCONIQ App, ,scan the  PAYCONIQ QR code, the amount to pay is automatically displayed on your phone. Validate the payment with your fingerprint/PIN Code and you’re done.
 
*** BILL PAYMENT WITH QR CODES
 
The quickest way to pay the bills: launch the App, scan the PAYCONIQ QR Code on the bill, confirm the payment and you’re done, typically in less than 10 seconds. It works with your insurance and energy bills, with your telecom and public sector/municipality invoices provided PAYCONIQ payments are accepted.
 
Feel free to use it at PAYCONIQ partner restaurants as well: no need to wait for the payment terminal, just scan the QR Code on the bill. 
 
*** PAYMENT IN OTHER APPS & IN ONLINE STORES
 
Top up your kid’s Restopolis account or use PAYCONIQ on selected web sites: it is the most secure and the most convenient way to pay by clicking on the PAYCONIQ button in the App/web site or in the web store. No card or bank data is transferred and nobody else can use your PAYCONIQ App as all payments are authorised via fingerprint/PIN Code.

Your account, your transaction, your customer satisfaction! 
R-Net Mobile app gives you access to your bank accounts from anywhere, anytime you like! 

Functionalities

• Overview and history of current assets and liabilities
• Credit card transactions
• Bank transfers to your own bank accounts
• Bank transfers to national and international bank accounts saved in your Raiffeisen.Net address book
• Bank transfers to all national and international bank accounts that are not saved in your Raiffeisen.Net address book

To use these functionalities, you need a Raiffeisen.Net contract and a LuxTrust Token.  

You may also find (even if you’re not a Raiffeisen customer): 
• Contact details, opening hours and the geographical position of the nearest Raiffeisen branch and ATMs 
• Useful numbers to get into contact with Raiffeisen

Benefits

• Accessibility
• Flexibility
• Security

About us 

Raiffeisen is a cooperative bank – which makes all the difference. We are committed to supporting you and serving your best interests. As your cooperative choice, it’s only natural for us to trust those who trust us.

eboo - POST’s eBanking app

What you can do with eboo:

Exclusive – Benefit from over 80 exclusive promotions, flash offers and good deals directly in your eBanking thanks to eboo Benefits

Need some help?

• 1st login: more information on post.lu/ebanking.

We are committed to protect and process your personal data in full transparency, security and confidentiality according to the European rules in force.

Perfect for beginners, or more seasoned traders, Revolut X has the tools to trade and manage your crypto. All available at your fingertips.

Trade in real-time on the crypto exchange, with market orders, or control the price you buy with limit orders. Explore 400+ available pairs to get the most from your trades, in USD, EUR, or GBP.

Move from crypto to cash and back again without blocks from your bank. There are no limits or barriers when you use Revolut X with your Revolut account. 

With security you can bank on, you can relax knowing the majority of our funds are held in cold storage. We’re trusted by 45+ million to protect £20.9 billion of their money — we’ve got experience at this. Your assets are held 1:1 and never lent out. Our purpose-built defences are constantly monitoring risks, to prevent account takeovers.

Access customer support 24/7, available in 100+ languages — and all our chats are encrypted, so your personal details stay safe.

Not regulated or protected. Value can go down. Tax may be payable on gains

16 million+ customers send, receive, spend and grow their money internationally with Wise. It’s the fast, simple way to move money in 160 countries and 40 currencies. Products available depend on where you live. Check wise.com or download the app to see what’s available for you.

— International money transfers —
• Send money to 70+ countries, fast
• Get the mid-market exchange rate, like on Google, for every money transfer
• On average, 64% of transfers arrive in under 20 seconds, and 95% arrive within 24 hours
• Secure your transfers with two-factor authentication, encryption and biometrics

— The debit card that’s always got the right currency —
• Spend or withdraw cash in more than 160+ countries
• If you don’t have the local currency, we’ll auto-convert what you have with the lowest possible price
• Freeze and unfreeze your card, and update your digital card details

— Get paid like a local —
• Get your own UK account number and sort code, European IBAN, Australian account details and more, as if you had local bank accounts around the world
• Use these account details to get paid in multiple currencies for free, and for direct debits
• Keep up-to-date with instant push notifications for every transaction

— Hold 40 currencies and convert between them instantly —
• No monthly fee and no maintenance fee to keep money in your account, in most cases
• Convert between currencies instantly, at the real exchange rate, for a super-low fee
• Auto-convert currencies at specific rates, and keep up to date with exchange rates with Rate Alerts

— Put your money to work with Assets —
• Try Interest or Stocks in a few taps. Available in the UK, Singapore and multiple EEA countries, for now
• Capital at risk, growth not guaranteed

— A better business account for going global —
• Pay invoices and bills faster, at a better exchange rate
• Use account details to get paid by clients and customers around the world
• Connect to supported platforms like Amazon, Stripe, Xero, and more

Kraken is the easy, safe and secure way to buy and sell bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies, now available in a simple, on-the-go app for investing and managing your account.

At the forefront of the Bitcoin revolution since 2011, Kraken is one of the largest and oldest Bitcoin exchanges in the world. Millions of clients around the world trust Kraken to buy and sell cryptocurrencies.

Whether you’re a crypto-beginner or an advanced trader, Kraken gives you the power to chart your own financial course, thanks to our excellent service, handy tools, low fees, versatile funding options and rigorous security standards.

Paying friends back, buying a new pair of shoes online, paying the electricity bill quickly or settling up for those purchases in-store: it’s so quick and easy to do using the Payconiq by Bancontact app on your smartphone.

Fast, simple mobile payments are within hand’s reach. Connect your Bancontact card, link your bank account to the app and you can start making mobile payments right away. Without jeopardising security: you confirm every payment using your personal PIN code. It’s really quick and easy!

You can use the Payconiq by Bancontact app to make mobile payments anywhere you find Bancontact or Payconiq as a mobile method of payment. You do require a Belgian bank account.


This is what Payconiq by Bancontact enables you to do:

∙ No cash or cards needed in-store: with your smartphone in your pocket or bag, you always have your wallet with you.
∙ Pay online without a card-reader: paying online has never been so simple, thanks to the app.
∙ Pay bills and invoices quickly by scanning a QR code.
∙ Pay back friends and family in an instant with the app. And you can do it remotely, too!

Download the Payconiq by Bancontact app on your smartphone. For more information, visit www.payconiq.be

This Payconiq by Bancontact app stores information on your mobile device and accesses information on your mobile device to make registration and authentication possible for security reasons. The Payconiq by Bancontact app uses Google Analytics to track and analyse usage anonymously within the Payconiq by Bancontact app. By downloading, installing or using the Payconiq by Bancontact app, you agree for the Bancontact Payconiq Company to store information on your device and to access information on your device. For more information, including about how consent can be withdrawn and how you can opt out of Google Analytics, as well as your right to access, amend and object to the processing of your personal data for promotional purposes, please read the Bancontact Payconiq Company privacy regulations on www.bancontactpayconiq.com.

BIL PAYCONIQ MOBILE PAYMENTS: QUICK, CONVENIENT, SECURE AND FREE

Pay with the BIL Payconiq app in Luxembourg, Belgium and the Netherlands. The app lets you make in-store purchases, pay your bills, and even send or request money with nothing more than a phone number!
The BIL Payconiq app is easy, quick and convenient; payments are transacted between bank accounts. Proof of payment (debit advice) is available for each transaction carried out with BIL Payconiq on BILnet, your online banking app. 

-------
*** A BANKING PAYMENT APP

BIL Payconiq is linked to your mobile number and your bank account. Bank security levels apply: all payments are authorised by fingerprint identification or secret code/PIN. You can set your own limits on BILnet, according to your preferences (EUR 2,500 by default). Transfers are carried out by SEPA payment (funds available the next business day). 

*** FAST ACTIVATION

To use the BIL Payconiq app, all you have to do is link it to your bank account(s). Launch the app and you’ll be guided through the process.

Send money, track money transfers, review exchange rates, and find agent locations near you - all on the go with the Western Union® money transfer app.  ​

----- ​ 
WE MOVE MONEY TO MORE THAN 200 COUNTRIES AND TERRITORIES
----- 
Your friends and family can receive the funds directly to their bank account, mobile wallet**, or cash pick up in minutes*** at one of our trusted agent locations. Choose from currencies such as Indian Rupees, Philippine Pesos, US Dollars, and many more.

EASILY VIEW EXCHANGE RATES
• View the latest international exchange rates instantly using the widget on our mobile money transfer app. Compare exchange rates for different currencies in real-time before you send money with the Western Union® app.

SET PREFERRED EXCHANGE RATE ALERTS
• Choose your preferred exchange rate and get notified instantly when it’s available. ​ 

SIMPLE CARD SCANNING
• Quickly make a money transfer by setting up card payments on your mobile phone. Avoid mistakes by scanning your credit or debit card using the camera on your device. 
  
PAY THE WAY THAT WORKS FOR YOU
​• Pay directly from your bank account, cash at an agent location, or with a credit****/debit card.
   
START ON THE MONEY TRANSFER APP, PAY IN CASH
• Save time at the counter by starting your money transfer on our app and paying in cash at a participating agent location.

TRACK YOUR TRANSFER
• You can easily track your money transfer via the app at any time using your tracking number (MTCN). Get notified via email when your receiver collects their money. ​

SEND AGAIN QUICKLY
• Save your receiver’s details to your resend list in the app to make repeat transfers fast. ​


----- 
EASY TO SEND, SIMPLE TO RECEIVE
----- 
With the Western Union® money transfer app for mobile, you can choose how your receiver will get their funds. 
​
Bank account
• Transfer money with our app on a mobile phone to billions of bank accounts worldwide, ensuring you stay better connected to those that matter to you most. ​

Mobile wallet
• Depending on the destination country, you can send money from the app directly to your receiver's mobile wallet.**

Cash pickup
• With hundreds of thousands of agent locations, we’re always nearby. Find a convenient agent location today so your receiver can collect their cash in minutes.***

Changed your mind?
• No problem, update the delivery method from cash pickup to bank account, whether you are the sender or receiver.


Ready to get started? Join millions of satisfied customers who trust Western Union for their international money transfers. Download the Western Union® app and send money today. 

Western Union has offices worldwide and is headquartered in Denver, 7001 E. Belleview, Denver, CO 80237.  ​
  ​
Got questions about our services? Contact one of Western Union agent locations. Use our agent location finder to find one nearby, or call +1-720-332-1000.  ​
  ​
*Western Union makes money from currency exchange. ​Additional third party fees may apply.
**Availability varies.​
***Delivery times may vary.​
****Credit card charges may apply.

Send money quickly and easily internationally with Western Union, a trusted brand for over 170 years with over 150 million customers. Transfer money in just a few taps to over 200 countries and territories in over 130 currencies for cash withdrawal, bank account, or mobile wallet. Benefit from simplified recurring transfers, quick estimation of fees and exchange rates, secure login with Face/Touch ID, real-time transfer tracking and 24/7 customer service.

Fleur is a cute and simple budget planner and tracker app. The app allows you to easily add daily expenses and income. You can also set a monthly budget, create multiple accounts and track your debt. Fleur is an all in one app that will help you manage your money.

Key Features:
- Minimal, elegant, and aesthetically pleasing design
- Easily log expenses and income
- Set a monthly budget
- View insights and understand spending habits
- View transaction history
- Add repeating transactions
- Create new categories
- iCloud sync
- No sign in required
- Easy search and filter

Read more about our Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy here:
https://fleurbudget.com/privacy_terms.html

We are always there for you!
